original_title: Nina Hartley's Guide to Sex for the Bi-Curious Woman
overview: Adult industry icon Nina Hartley knows good sex! In this installment of her acclaimed How To series, she explores the bisexual desires of women through communication, seduction, and sophisticated sexual techniques. Here, Nina and friends Justine Joli, Andreanna Nicole, and Gia Paloma demonstrate how this once taboo, yet surprisingly popular topic can be handled with honesty, humor, and erotic passion.
title: Nina Hartley's Guide to Sex for the Bi-Curious Woman
